entry.title: WIND WARNING ENDED, Pincher Creek
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:37 AM MST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Haze, -1.5°C

entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Sunny. 30 percent chance of flurries near the British Columbia border. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 70. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Clear. 30 percent chance of flurries near the British Columbia border. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 02 March 2023
